about.summary: Utilities for processing the parameters of various statistical models. Beyond computing p values, CIs, and other indices for a wide variety of models (see support list of insight; Lüdecke, Waggoner & Makowski (2019) <doi:10.21105/joss.01412>), this package implements features like standardization or bootstrapping of parameters and models, feature reduction (feature extraction and variable selection) as well as conversion between indices of effect size.

Utilities for processing the parameters of various statistical models. Beyond computing p values, CIs, and other indices for a wide variety of models (see support list of insight; Lüdecke, Waggoner & Makowski (2019) <doi:10.21105/joss.01412>), this package implements features like standardization or bootstrapping of parameters and models, feature reduction (feature extraction and variable selection) as well as conversion between indices of effect size.

name: r-parameters
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.28.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-parameters
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/parameters_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/parameters/parameters_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ed173f0242173c29e1f2bce58f70fd4677c5386460c571177a2824a2067c8229

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-bayestestr >=0.15.2
    - r-datawizard >=1.0.2
    - r-insight >=1.2.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-bayestestr >=0.15.2
    - r-datawizard >=1.0.2
    - r-insight >=1.2.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('parameters')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('parameters')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://easystats.github.io/parameters/
  dev_url: https://github.com/easystats/parameters/
  doc_url: https://easystats.github.io/parameters/reference/
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Utilities for processing the parameters of various statistical models. Beyond computing p values, CIs, and other indices for a wide variety of models (see support list of insight; Lüdecke, Waggoner & Makowski (2019) <doi:10.21105/joss.01412>), this package implements features like standardization or bootstrapping
    of parameters and models, feature reduction (feature extraction and variable selection) as well as conversion between indices of effect size.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
